prompts.name: Tournament App Development
prompts.description: Guidelines for developing the tournament management app
prompts.prompt: This project is a JavaFX tournament management application with knockout system support. Follow these conventions: use MVC pattern, implement data models clearly, ensure responsive UI design.

prompts.name: Implementation of Tournament Management
prompts.description: Tasklist for implementing the tournament management features.
prompts.prompt: Use the CONTEXT.md file (containing the tasks) for implementing the tasks step by step assisted by the user
